page.title: 04Adult leisure in Clapham
page.content: In Clapham there are lots of occupations for adults but the main things are the pubs and clubs including The Fox and Hounds The Star, The Swan, The Horse and Groom and The Clapham Club. People usually go on disco nights but some go for the bingo and games. Some people go horse riding at Tinsley's School of Horse Riding. Adults go at a different time from the children, but they must get there on time. We have a few children's occupations, including judo, Brownies, Cubs and Clapham Park. At Clapham Club there is bingo for the ladies and snooker, darts and skittles for the men. Every year the club has a trip to Great Yarmouth by coach. They leave in the morning and come back at night.
